channel.title: Partial HUD disapperance after Quick Save
channel.description:
I found strange issue with the game HUD.
Sometimes (not always), when hitting Quick Save, game HUD partially disappears, along with the crosshair. Here's how it looks like:
[img]https://f.cl.ly/items/203X181C3S1G3u2U1u3Q/bm_c2a4f0033.jpg[/img]
The thing that helps, is hitting ESC (the menu), and then again to resume playing:
[img]https://f.cl.ly/items/0E1v1l0m2y3p022Z0I3J/bm_c2a4f0034.jpg[/img]
Hope it won't be any big problem fixing it :slight_smile:
